Class Hash
In: lib/extensions/hash.rb
Parent: Object

Methods

add_key_for_checkboxes  

Public Instance methods

add_key_for_checkboxes(name)

this method adds an key/value pair in the pattern of :<name> => [] to the hash only if the key <name> doesn‘t already exists. this function is provided due to http post‘s lack of providing the checkboxes field when no cb is selected. I‘m pretty sure that this could be moved direcly into the model or even ActiveRecord.

[Source]

    # File lib/extensions/hash.rb, line 8
 8: def add_key_for_checkboxes name
 9:   self[name.to_s] = [] if self.stringify_keys[name.to_s].nil?
10: end

[Validate]
